room_title: Escape room "Escape from Alcatraz" by Locked Up - Mishawaka in South Bend
review: The owner was very flexible and helpful with our group. Very clean and professional atmosphere. The Escape from Alcatraz game was challenging but very possible with critical thinking. We escaped with 3 minutes left. Highly recommended for a fun time!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Alcatraz" by Locked Up - Mishawaka in South Bend
review: Who knew being panicked and stressed out could be so much fun! We did the escape Alcatraz room tonight and killed it. Very challenging and a lot of fun! I'd recommend this place for sure! 42 minutes booo-ya!
